participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, loves hands-on activities and enjoys teaching young children.
participant_1.background: My father is a retired police officer. I like to build furniture. I clean houses for extra money. I have been held hostage in a store robbery situation. I have bowled a 300 game twice in my life.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and outgoing, enjoys outdoor activities and is passionate about education.
participant_2.background: I live in a big city. On weekends I like to go hiking. I want to teach kids in elementary school. I just graduated college. My major was american literature and education.

content.text: I'm glad you're enjoying your new job as a teacher. I'm a teacher too!
That's great! What grade do you teach?
I teach kindergarten.
Wow, that must be a lot of fun! I want to teach elementary school, but I'm not sure what grade I want to teach yet.
I think kindergarten is a lot of fun because the kids are so eager to learn. But it can also be challenging because they're still learning how to behave and follow directions.
I think I would enjoy the challenge. I like working with kids and helping them learn.
I think you'd make a great teacher!
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
So, what's your favorite thing about teaching?
I love seeing the kids learn and grow. It's so rewarding to know that you're making a difference in their lives.
I agree. That's my favorite part of teaching too.
So, what grade do you think you'll teach?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still trying to decide. But I'm leaning towards second grade.
Second grade is a great grade. I have a friend who teaches second grade and she loves it.
I'm glad to hear that. I think I would enjoy it too.
So, what are your other hobbies?
I like to bowl. I've bowled a 300 game twice in my life.
Wow! That's amazing! I've never bowled a 300 game.
I'm not sure how I did it. I just got lucky I guess.
Well, you're obviously a very good bowler.
Thank you. I like to think so.
So, what other hobbies do you have?
I also like to build furniture. I'm not very good at it, but it's fun to do.
That's cool. I've never built furniture before.
It's not too hard. You just need a few tools and some wood.
I might have to try it sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
